ore.exception
Class BrokenCometException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          ore.exception.BrokenCometException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BrokenCometException
extends java.lang.Exception

This exception is thrown when Jetty is unable to reach a client through the Comet connection. Presumably the client's browser has become unreachable unexpectedly (i.e. force quit).

See Also:
